title: Matogrosso Script released by Sudtipos
content:
[Matogrosso](http://web.archive.org/web/20100203001218/http:/www.veer.com/products/typedetail.aspx?image=UMT0000429)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20100203001218im_/http:/typophile.com/files/matogtypoph_6157.jpg)

A new rustic calligraphic script from Argentine calligraphy team Koziupa and Paul. Ideal to use on wine labels or organic food packaging, stationery and old maps. It also makes a great choice for designs relating to outdoor activities and rugged travel, where the concept of the wild is to be accentuated.

Matogrossoâ€™s OpenType programming combines several alternate lowercase characters to generate perfect fit and more natural textures.

Visit [Sudtipos](http://web.archive.org/web/20100203001218/http:/www.sudtipos.com/).
author: Ale Paul

comments.content:
Very nice Ale! You guys make such a good team! I love the texture.

-Charles
